sqlMap.select: select ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARDHOLDER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, EXTERNAL_ID, CARD_NO, CARD_PIN_STATE, CARD_STATE, LEG_CARD_NO, CREDIT_AMOUNT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, ORDER_LIST_ID from TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST where ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID = #orderCardListId:VARCHAR#

select ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARDHOLDER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, EXTERNAL_ID, CARD_NO, CARD_PIN_STATE, CARD_STATE, LEG_CARD_NO, CREDIT_AMOUNT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, ORDER_LIST_ID from TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert: insert into TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST (ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARDHOLDER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, EXTERNAL_ID, CARD_NO, CARD_PIN_STATE, CARD_STATE, LEG_CARD_NO, CREDIT_AMOUNT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, ORDER_LIST_ID) values (#orderCardListId:VARCHAR#, #orderId:VARCHAR#, #cardholderId:VARCHAR#, #lastName:VARCHAR#, #firstName:VARCHAR#, #externalId:VARCHAR#, #cardNo:VARCHAR#, #cardPinState:CHAR#, #cardState:CHAR#, #legCardNo:VARCHAR#, #creditAmount:VARCHAR#, #createUser:VARCHAR#, #createTime:CHAR#, #modifyUser:VARCHAR#, #modifyTime:CHAR#, #dataState:CHAR#, #orderListId:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST set ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#, CARDHOLDER_ID = #cardholderId:VARCHAR#, LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#, FIRST_NAME = #firstName:VARCHAR#, EXTERNAL_ID = #externalId:VARCHAR#, CARD_NO = #cardNo:VARCHAR#, CARD_PIN_STATE = #cardPinState:CHAR#, CARD_STATE = #cardState:CHAR#, LEG_CARD_NO = #legCardNo:VARCHAR#, CREDIT_AMOUNT = #creditAmount:VARCHAR#, CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#, MODIFY_USER = #modifyUser:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_TIME = #modifyTime:CHAR#, DATA_STATE = #dataState:CHAR#, ORDER_LIST_ID = #orderListId:VARCHAR# where ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID = #orderCardListId:VARCHAR#

update TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST
ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#
CARDHOLDER_ID = #cardholderId:VARCHAR#
LAST_NAME = #lastName:VARCHAR#
FIRST_NAME = #firstName:VARCHAR#
EXTERNAL_ID = #externalId:VARCHAR#
CARD_NO = #cardNo:VARCHAR#
CARD_PIN_STATE = #cardPinState:CHAR#
CARD_STATE = #cardState:CHAR#
LEG_CARD_NO = #legCardNo:VARCHAR#
CREDIT_AMOUNT = #creditAmount:VARCHAR#
CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:CHAR#
MODIFY_USER = #modifyUser:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_TIME = #modifyTime:CHAR#
DATA_STATE = #dataState:CHAR#
ORDER_LIST_ID = #orderListId:VARCHAR#
where ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID = #orderCardListId:VARCHAR#

update TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST
ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID = #record.orderCardListId:VARCHAR#
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#
CARDHOLDER_ID = #record.cardholderId:VARCHAR#
LAST_NAME = #record.lastName:VARCHAR#
FIRST_NAME = #record.firstName:VARCHAR#
EXTERNAL_ID = #record.externalId:VARCHAR#
CARD_NO = #record.cardNo:VARCHAR#
CARD_PIN_STATE = #record.cardPinState:CHAR#
CARD_STATE = #record.cardState:CHAR#
LEG_CARD_NO = #record.legCardNo:VARCHAR#
CREDIT_AMOUNT = #record.creditAmount:VARCHAR#
CREATE_USER = #record.createUser:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:CHAR#
MODIFY_USER = #record.modifyUser:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_TIME = #record.modifyTime:CHAR#
DATA_STATE = #record.dataState:CHAR#
ORDER_LIST_ID = #record.orderListId:VARCHAR#

update TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST set ORDER_CARD_LIST_ID = #record.orderCardListId:VARCHAR#, ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#, CARDHOLDER_ID = #record.cardholderId:VARCHAR#, LAST_NAME = #record.lastName:VARCHAR#, FIRST_NAME = #record.firstName:VARCHAR#, EXTERNAL_ID = #record.externalId:VARCHAR#, CARD_NO = #record.cardNo:VARCHAR#, CARD_PIN_STATE = #record.cardPinState:CHAR#, CARD_STATE = #record.cardState:CHAR#, LEG_CARD_NO = #record.legCardNo:VARCHAR#, CREDIT_AMOUNT = #record.creditAmount:VARCHAR#, CREATE_USER = #record.createUser:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:CHAR#, MODIFY_USER = #record.modifyUser:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_TIME = #record.modifyTime:CHAR#, DATA_STATE = #record.dataState:CHAR#, ORDER_LIST_ID = #record.orderListId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT cardList.CARD_NO as "cardNo" from TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST cardList,tb_sell_order orde where orde.order_id=cardList.Order_Id and orde.order_type !='10000003' and cardList.cardholder_id=#cardHolderId:VARCHAR# and cardList.data_state='1' and cardList.card_no is not null order by cardList.card_no asc

select cardholder.first_name as "firstName", cardholder.id_type as "certType", '**'||substr(cardholder.id_no,3,length(cardholder.id_no)-4)||'**' as "certNo", '******'||substr(cardlist.card_no,7,length(cardlist.card_no)-7)||'*' as "cardNo", ord.face_value/100 as "creditAmount" from tb_sell_order_card_list cardlist, tb_cardholder cardholder, tb_sell_order ord where ord.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and ord.order_type in ('10000001','10000011','10000005') and cardlist.order_id=ord.order_id and cardholder.cardholder_id=cardlist.cardholder_id and cardlist.data_state='1'
